game.title: Quest for the Capital
game.objective: Find the capital of the United States
game.description: The capital of the United States is an important historical and political site. Help find it!

task.objective: Visit the Library and learn about the history of the United States
task.description: The library contains many books with information about the history of the United States. Speak to the librarian for assistance.

task.objective: Speak to the Historian at the Museum of American History
task.description: The historian has a wealth of knowledge about the history and culture of the United States. Speak to them for more information.
Using the information gathered from the library and museum, locate the capital city of the United States: Washington, D.C.
